intents.sub_intent: how to save money on insurance premiums
intents.user_motivation: Users want actionable advice to reduce costs without compromising coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel their insurance costs are too high or want to optimize their spending.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Leverage ING's digital tools to provide personalized insurance savings calculators.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Listicle with actionable tips and embedded calculators.

intents.sub_intent: how to choose the best insurance plan
intents.user_motivation: Users want guidance on selecting the most suitable insurance plan for their needs.
intents.search_context: Users search this when comparing options or entering a new life stage (e.g., buying a car, starting a family).
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Highlight ING's European expertise in offering tailored insurance solutions.

intents.sub_intent: how to avoid common insurance mistakes
intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they make informed decisions and avoid costly errors.
intents.search_context: Users search this when they feel uncertain about their insurance knowledge or after experiencing issues.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Build trust by offering educational content that simplifies complex insurance topics.
intents.content_format_recommendation: Educational blog post with real-life examples.

intents.user_motivation: Users want to ensure they receive the full benefits of their insurance coverage.
intents.search_context: Users search this after experiencing an incident or preparing to file a claim.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Provide step-by-step guides and digital tools for claim optimization.

intents.sub_intent: how to lower auto insurance costs
intents.user_motivation: Users want practical strategies to reduce their car insurance expenses.
intents.search_context: Users search this when renewing policies or comparing quotes.
intents.ing_positioning_opportunity: Offer digital tools for comparing auto insurance rates and discounts.

sub_intents: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to lower auto insurance costs
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: ING's digital banking leadership can provide tools for cost comparison and savings tracking.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop a unified hub for insurance savings tips, calculators, and comparison tools.

sub_intents: how to choose the best insurance plan
how to avoid common insurance mistakes
intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Leverage ING's European expertise to offer localized insurance advice.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Create educational content with decision-making frameworks and real-life examples.

intent_clusters.ing_competitive_advantage: Provide step-by-step guides and digital tools to simplify the claims process.
intent_clusters.content_strategy: Develop detailed guides and templates for claim filing and optimization.

highest_probability_streams: how to save money on insurance premiums
how to lower auto insurance costs
quick_wins: Create listicles with actionable tips for insurance savings.
Develop step-by-step guides for maximizing claims.
Offer interactive tools for comparing auto insurance rates.
strategic_priorities: Invest in a unified content hub for insurance cost optimization.
Develop localized educational content for European markets.
Expand ING's digital tools to include insurance-specific calculators and templates.
